name: 現代全像術
goals: 1. Understand the recording and reconstruction methods of holography.
2. Learn the characteristics, principles and application methods and technologies of computer holograms, and learn to generate computer holograms and related applications and technologies.
3. Recognize the characteristics of digital holographic optical recording and learn its numerical reconstruction method.
4. A case study of learning computer holography and digital holography.
